item.title: Re: The Voice of the Soul
item.content:encoded: Well, the Sword loops, so if you say you're doing Reaper againâ€¦ You probably already have the sword, thus the mission won't open up again.

item.title: The Voice of the Soul
item.content:encoded:
Hey guys iam S2 and doing the reaper quests again i just did Hijinks Ensue and i wanted my sword but the quest didnt unlock whats up with that, Iam Sp.Jonin by the way.
Thanks.
